newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Rareco's interim shr loss deepens, no div.
newsitem.headline: Rareco's interim shr loss deepens, no div.

text.p: Half year ended December 31, 1996 vs 18 months to June 30, 1996
Full name: Rare Earth Extraction Company Ltd (venture capital)

NOTE - The company said its geologists had completed a re-evaluation of its ore reserves at the Steenkampskraal mine and resulted in a 30 percent increase in reserves which would be sufficient to sustain the life of the mine for ten years.

It said a mining plan for Steenkampskraal had been completed and mining risks would be low due to the shallow depth and the consequent small scale of mining operations required to meet its production demands.
